description: This file defines a React component for a chat session page in a Next.js application. It manages state for chat messages, handles sending messages and uploading attachments, and renders the chat interface with sidebar and interactive panel.

methods.name: ChatSessionPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the chat interface for a specific session ID, manages message state, interactions, and UI rendering.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Uploads selected files to the server.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Sends the message input to the server, updates the UI with the new message or error.
